snippet: Eight others were wounded in the attack in the Charkh district of Logar Province, which local officials attributed to a drone strike.
abstract: American drone airstrike kills five Afghan National Army soldiers and wounds eight more; American officials say they will investigate deaths, which occurred while aircraft were supporting a ground mission led by Afghan forces.
lead_paragraph: Eight others were wounded in the attack in the Charkh district of Logar Province, which local officials attributed to a drone strike.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Airstrike Kills 5 Soldiers of Afghanistan

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
